title: Mummy Pigs New Baby Girl Has A Lookalike Toy At Walmart Heres Where To Get Her If You Cant Wait For A Restock.html
content: Shopping Tips and Deals **Mummy Pig’s new baby girl has a lookalike toy at Walmart — here’s where to get her if you can’t wait for a restock** Updated:Jun. 11, 2025, 6:05 a.m. |Published:Jun. 11, 2025, 6:05 a.m. Danielle Halibey | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com Evie Pig still hasn’t even celebrated her one-month birthday yet, but since arriving this spring, she’s already amassed a cult following. Hasbro launched a handful oftoys inspired by Peppa’s new family of five, but theWalmart-exclusive playthings, including thefastest-selling Baby Evie doll, have been sold out for weeks. While we haven’t heard anything about a restock at Walmart as of yet,eBay listings for the Peppa Pig Toys Oinks + Snuggles Baby Evie Interactive Baby Dollare stacking up. According to the splash banner onPeppa Pig’s YouTube channel, Baby Evie will finally be appearing on screen in new Peppa Pig Tales that will air beginning on June 20 (on Nick Jr. and YouTube). Now, with no confirmed Walmart restock in sight, parents are turning to eBay to get their hands on what’s shaping up to be one of the most sought-after toys of the summer. At 11 inches tall, Evie is the perfect size for little ones to cuddle, carry, and care for. Her soft body and expressive plastic face — with that heart-shaped birthmark of hers —make her feel like a real baby, while her built-in sound effects bring her to life in a way that’s sweet and totally toddler-approved. She responds to nurturing play with over 20 different sound effects, from giggles and oinks to lullabies and snores. Kiddos can feed her with the included bottle, pop in her pacifier, bounce her up and down, lay her down for a nap, or tune in to the latest Peppa installments alongside the series’ newest star. As they watch Peppa and George adjust to life with a new baby sister, toddlers, preschoolers, and kindergartners can mirror those moments at home, acting out scenes and playing make believe. If you missed thepresale at Walmart, don’t stress but maybe don’t wait too long either. Because once the new episodes drop, the demand for Baby Evie is only going to grow.
